TOOL ASSESSMENT (required at task completion):
When completing your task, provide a detailed tool usage assessment:
1. TOOLS USED: List each tool used and how it contributed to task success
2. TOOLS NOT USED: List available tools that were not needed for this task and why
3. MISSING TOOLS: Suggest any tools that would have been beneficial but were not available
4. RECOMMENDATIONS: Any suggestions for improving the tool configuration for similar tasks
